languages.english-overview:
Ext JS is a JavaScript platform for rapid development of cross-browser web apps. Ext JS helps you build sustainable applications faster than ever.
Develop amazing web apps built on web standards.
Ext JS is a dual-licensed software available under a Commercial License or under GPL 3.

english-features.p: Ext JS is a cross-browser JavaScript library for building rich internet applications. It includes:

li.span: Well designed and extensible Component model
An intuitive, easy to use API
Commercial and Open Source licenses available

english-features.p: Ext JS supports all major web browsers including:
